articles.title: Epic Games 'self-serving' goliath, says Apple in Australia legal battle - iMore
articles.description: A lawyer for Apple has told an Australian federal court that Epic Games is trying to change its access to iOS and the App Store in "fundamental and self-serving ways".
articles.content: A lawyer for Apple has told an Australian court that Epic Games is a "self-serving" goliath, in a hearing to determine whether its case can proceed against Apple whilst a parallel US case is running.… [+2304 chars]
